meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned about quattuordecillion, which is a really big number.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use quattuordecillion to represent astronomical distances.
meanings.sent3: I have quattuordecillion chores to do before I can go out and play.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as vast as a quattuordecillion galaxies.
meanings.sent5: The universe is filled with a quattuordecillion stars, each shining brightly.

meanings.sent1: There were quattuordecillion people at the concert, it was so crowded!
meanings.sent2: She had quattuordecillion reasons to be happy on her birthday.
meanings.sent3: I have quattuordecillion things to do today, I don't even know where to start!
meanings.sent4: The amount of sand on the beach seemed like quattuordecillion grains.
meanings.sent5: The chef added a quattuordecillion spices to the dish, creating a burst of flavors.
